nodes.text: Sassan Sareeta was a member of the Sareeta species. Sareeta was a smuggler who worked for the criminal organization Syndicate One during the early years of the New Republic. He flew the customized YT-1300 light freighter Moondrake.

During a smuggling run in the Harrin Trade Corridor Sareeta encountered a group of TIE fighters in a picket line. He put all his shields forward and rammed his way through the blockade and escaped. This impressed Saujutta-Ok-Topii who hired the pilot to supervise the transport of Syndicate One's cargos.
